quest.name: Take to the Skies
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
The eccentric creator has a request for Azem's familiar.
objectives: Use fine aetheric rope to capture restless plants.
Deliver the bound plants to the eccentric creator.

dialogue.name: STAFF04297
dialogue.text: You must be Azem's familiar. I had a favor to ask of the observers here, but seeing as they all seem awfully preoccupied, perhaps I can ask you instead.

dialogue.name: STAFF04297
dialogue.text: I'm experimenting with crossbreeding different types of plants. I was thrilled when I finally produced a whole new species...right up until the point where they rose up and floated away.

dialogue.name: STAFF04297
dialogue.text: Last I saw of them, they were headed toward the eastern side of the island. I managed to wrangle a goodly number, but there are still eight or so missing. Could you help me recapture them?

dialogue.name: STAFF04297
dialogue.text: Thank you. Here, use this aetheric rope to capture say, four of them, and I can hopefully handle the rest.

dialogue.name: STAFF04297
dialogue.text: Thank goodness for that, though I'd expect no less from Azem's familiar. I rounded up my half as well, which means they're all back safe and sound.

dialogue.name: STAFF04297
dialogue.text: They're part yggdreant, you see. It's no surprise they inherited the eyes, but having them wander off on their own was rather unexpected.

dialogue.name: STAFF04297
dialogue.text: To tell the truth, I never really had a specific use in mind for them. I suppose I'd best start thinking about that... The Bureau of the Architect won't be impressed with my new creation unless it serves a purpose.

dialogue.name: STAFF04297
dialogue.text: With that in mind, I believe there's research to be done. Thank you for your help, and do pass on my regards to Azem.
